Text:
Quality is good, be aware that there is no menu (and no chapters anyway) and that this is in German.


Good upload

Oddly enough, it is in French here! :)

Neither menu nor chapters. And the video quality is not quite average, I'm afraid.

Oiw, not that a good upload. Any dvd-rip-quality upload would be as good in terms of video quality and much much less time-consuming in terms of download length.
